body.title: Basic RDoc format
body.elms:
```rb
# Foo.
#
# @example
#
#   y
#   g
#
# @param [String] param_name The xx and xx.
#
# @see https://example.com/
#
# @return [true] if so
```

body.title: Definition lists
body.elms:
```rb
# == Definition lists
#
# list::  hi.
# +foo+:: parameterized
```

```rb
# == Definition lists
# [foo]   also
# [bar]   like this
```

body.title: Callseq
body.elms:
```rb
# :call-seq:
#   ARGF.readlines(sep=$/)     -> array
#   ARGF.readlines(limit)      -> array
#   ARGF.readlines(sep, limit) -> array
#
#   ARGF.to_a(sep=$/)     -> array
#   ARGF.to_a(limit)      -> array
#   ARGF.to_a(sep, limit) -> array
```

body.title: Sections
body.elms:
```rb
# :section: Expiry methods
# methods relating to expiring

def expire!
def expired?
...
```

body.title: Using tomdoc
body.elms:
```rb
# :markup: TomDoc
```

Place this at the beginning of the file.
